description.narrative: This activity (SPARC - Procurement of Services) is a component of State Partnership for Accountability, Responsiveness and Capability reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £62,683,123. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management, Public finance management (PFM), Decentralisation and support to subnational government. , with the following implementing partners: Baker Tilly Nigeria, DAI Europe. The start date is 01-08-2008 and the end date is 30-04-2016.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)
